me.s3ns3iw00.jcommands

Interface CommandAction


  • public interface CommandAction
    The action listener
    Author:
    S3nS3IW00

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onCommand(org.javacord.api.entity.user.User sender, java.lang.String[] raw, ArgumentResult[] args, org.javacord.api.entity.message.Message msg, org.javacord.api.entity.message.Messageable source)
      A method signature that represents an action

    • Method Detail

      • onCommand

        void onCommand(org.javacord.api.entity.user.User sender,
               java.lang.String[] raw,
               ArgumentResult[] args,
               org.javacord.api.entity.message.Message msg,
               org.javacord.api.entity.message.Messageable source)
        A method signature that represents an action
        Parameters:
        sender - is the User who sent the message
        raw - is the array that contains the user's inputs
        args - is the array that contains the converted results
        msg - is the message that contains the command
        source - the message's source
        Is the message is private the source is the User or else the source is the channel where the message is.
